actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to permit certain proprietary organizations to conduct functional assessments and develop individual community care plans for purposes of providing home and community care for functionally disabled individuals under State plans for medical assistance under such title.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to permit certain proprietary organizations to conduct functional assessments and to develop individual community care plans in order to provide home and community care for functionally disabled individuals.

titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to permit certain proprietary organizations to conduct functional assessments and develop individual community care plans for purposes of providing home and community care for functionally disabled individuals under State plans for medical assistance under such title.
